original_title: アーバンスクウェア 琥珀の追撃
overview: Ryou Matsumoto is a screenplay writer that runs into a man and witnesses his murder. Unknown to him, he gets caught up in an illegal antique ring along with a girl he meets named Yuki. In order to survive, he ends up acting out the "action hero" role that he writes in his screenplays.
title: Urban Square: In Pursuit of Amber
